item.title: [GLOBAL][Web Hosting] - OVH Mail Migrator maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 3, 07:30 UTC  -  Nov 4, 18:00 UTC

Oct 29, 16:53 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on OVH Mail Migrator service.

Start time : 03/11/2025 07:30 UTC
End time : 04/11/2025 18:00 UTC
Service impact : OVH Mail Migrator API need an extra header to continue to work
Service improvement : We're making some changes to the OVH Mail Migrator (https://omm.ovh.net) API.

Starting November 3rd, 2025, customers who use our API will need to add an extra HTTP header when creating new migrations or projects.
This header is called X-Ovh-Use-Obsolete-Api and it should be set to 1.

If you don't add this header, you'll receive an error message saying that the API is deprecated and will be removed on November 24th, 2025.
The error message will also point you to a webpage where you can find more information about the changes.

The reason for this change is that we're introducing a new version of the API, called API v3, which will be available on November 24th, 2025.

This new API will replace the current one, and you'll need to use it to create new migrations, projects, or file uploads.

If you want to learn more about the new API, you can visit https://omm.ovh.net/NewApi from November 3rd, where you'll find more information about its structure and the required headers.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster115 incident notification
item.description:
Nov 1, 09:28 UTC
Monitoring - Service has been fully restored since 01/11/2025 09:25 UTC. Monitoring remains active to ensure long-term stability.

Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access and use their websites hosted on Cluster115.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their websites hosted on Cluster115.
